name: Learn Unity
tagline: Unity project examples for the book Learn Unity 4 for iOS Game Development
body:
This is the github site for an upcoming book, Learn Unity 4 for iOS Game Development, currently available as an [Apress alpha book](http://www.apress.com/9781430248750 Learn Unity 4 for iOS Game Development).

The github projects don't include assets from the Unity Asset Store and Standard Assets that are used in the book, but the HyperBowl-style bowling game developed by following the book, complete with Asset Store assets and Unity Standard Assets, is [on the App Store](https://itunes.apple.com/app/learn-unity/id634845779 Learn Unity app).

The book and app demonstrate Unity graphics and physics, an iad banner ad, Game Center leaderboard and achievements, and utilitize free Asset Store packages:

* [Eighteen Free Substances](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/content/1352) from [Allegorithmic](http://allegorithmic.com)
* [Free ArtskillZ Texture Pack 01](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/content/351) from [ArtskillZ](http://artskillz.net)
* [Skeletons Pack](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/content/1818) from [bisaniyehocam](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/publisher/645)
* [General Music Set](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/content/2589) from [Gianmarco Leone](http://gianmarcoleone.com/)
* [Free SFX Package](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/content/5178) from [Bleep Blop Audio](http://bleepblopaudio.com/)
* [Barrel](https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/#/content/840) from [Universal Image](http://monstertruckherohd.com/)

Questions can be posted on the [Unity forum](http://forum.unity3d.com/threads/173210-Learn-Unity-for-iOS-Game-Development).

Technical review provided by March Shaerer of [Gayasoft](http://gayasoft.ch).
